fragrances.name: Eternity
fragrances.description: Designed in Spain in 1990, Eternity cologne is a strong, floral fragrance that can be worn all day long. This fragrance has been a fan favorite for over 30 years. It's no wonder it was named “Eternity”--you can wear it every day and still feel as hypnotized as you were the day you first experienced it!

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Asad Zanzibar
fragrances.description: The scent profile of Lattafa Asad Zanzibar is a masterful blend of energetic top notes, intriguing middle notes, and a grounding base. It becomes notable as it starts the show with an oriental spices that are generally very lively, creating a really nice first impression. As the flowers begin to blossom, the scent unfolds beautifully, like a rich cloth weaved with different types of flowers and wood notes that Zanzibar is famous for. Ultimately, the basic notes are set to a soft combination of amber and incense, which creates a warm earthly feel and lends a smoky trace that warmly stays on the skin.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Acqua Di Gio
fragrances.description: You'll be greeted with fresh, flirty top notes of lime, lemon, bergamot, jasmine, orange, mandarin and neroli followed by juicy middle notes of peach, freesia, rosemary, violet, rose and nutmeg. Grounding this light yet masculine fragrance are earthy base notes of white musk, cedar, oakmoss, patchouli and amber. These fragrance notes blend wonderfully to create a fresh masculine scent that's sure to tantalize and delight the senses.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Eros
fragrances.description: Versace Eros Cologne by Versace, When it comes to men's fragrances that exude power, confidence, and seduction, Versace Eros stands out as a true masterpiece, a scent that is subtle yet suggestive and has a quiet strength that any modern man will appreciate. Inspired by Eros, the Greek god of love and desire, this fragrance captures the essence of masculinity in a captivating and alluring manner.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Badee Al-Oud Sublime
fragrances.description: This Lattafa fragrance begins with sweet top notes of saffron, lavender and nutmeg before mingling with earthy middle notes of patchouli and oud. Woody and earthy base notes of additional oud and patchouli, as well as musk, create a seductive and elegant scent.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Club De Nuit
fragrances.description: Club De Nuit Intense Man starts off with a fun fruit-filled top layer of lemon, pineapple, black currant, bergamot and apple. Fruits give way to a middle layer of jasmine, rose and birch. Finally, a base layer of musk, ambergris, patchouli and vanilla anchors this intense scent, leaving behind a sense of refined masculinity.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Le Male Elixir
fragrances.description: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male Elixir opens with a fresh burst of mint and bergamot, delivering a refreshing and invigorating start. The central part of the perfume is a combination of lavender and spicy cinnamon, which is a wonderful and aromatic core of the fragrance that is both calming and stimulating. The perfume is closed by a rich base of vanilla, amber and tonka bean, which gives a creamy and intoxicating warmth that is left on the skin for a long time and adds a special touch to your scent.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Pour Homme
fragrances.description: Versace Pour Homme Cologne by Versace is a popular aromatic fougere for the modern man that features a blend of Mediterranean-inspired ingredients, starting with top notes of neroli, lemon, bergamot, and rose de Mai. The Versace cologne Pour Homme then delves into warm heart notes of clary sage, geranium, cedar, and hyacinth before finishing off with base notes of amber, tonka bean, and musk, creating a sensual fragrance that's warm and inviting while still being light. Versace Pour Homme cologne has moderate sillage and longevity, which makes it a perfect choice for a finishing touch to your everyday wardrobe all year round. It also makes a great gift! Treat someone special to a bottle of Versace Pour Homme eau de toilette today, or stock up on this designer cologne for yourself:

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Y EDP
fragrances.description: Y for Men opens with aldehydes, bergamot, ginger, lemon and mint. This clean and exhilarating introduction leads into a sweet and green heart of apple, geranium, pineapple, sage and violet leaf notes. Ambergris and musk combine with balsam fir, cedar, incense and vetiver for an earthy, smoky and evergreen finish.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: 9PM Rebel
fragrances.description: Afnan 9pm Rebel opens with a dynamic burst of freshness, featuring top notes of zesty citrus and vibrant spices that immediately captivate the senses. The charm of the perfume is changed to a heart where the sweet floral scents are mixed with the seductive spices creating a tricky yet attractive aura. The woody deep notes of the base make the fragrance lasting, the warmth and the depth of it are emphasized with the almost unnoticeable hints of amber and musk that create an attractive ending.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Mankind Rise
fragrances.description: The allure of Kenneth Cole Mankind Rise begins with an invigorating blend of top notes that awaken the senses. It is like bright citrus and shimmering green chlorophyll, both of which give an easy and a model of the course, the fresh, lively awakening of nature, for a treasured centerpiece of the floral fragrance. In the middle notes, a rich fusion of aromatic spices and softwoods give depth and character, thus, scent imbibed with a sophisticated warmth. As for the base notes, they leave a profound hint mixed with earthly vetiver, strong mosslike oak, and small cloud of a friendly amber, which is the final tone that acidifies strength and integrity.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Amazonas Solstice
fragrances.description: Atralia Amazonas Solstice Perfume by Atralia

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Narcotic Delight
fragrances.description: Initio Narcotic Delight is composed of an exquisite combination of notes that offers a unique olfactory experience. The top notes of pink pepper and spicy accords form the majestic spice entrance, which rules your sense of perception with an active mood. The thick bouquet of flowers in the heart of the perfume, which contains jasmine and tuberose as the dominant odors, creates a romantic and intoxicating floral atmosphere. Upon the fragrance lingering, it soothingly transforms to a warm and inviting base of vanilla and amber, which are the remnants of a long but sweet journey that is both cozy and sensual.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Light Blue
fragrances.description: Delight in the fresh, citrus notes of Light Blue Eau Intense Cologne. Starting with the top notes of mandarin orange and frozen grapefruit, this cologne blends into the heart notes of juniper and salty marine accords. It finishes with a smooth base of amber, wood and musk.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Spicebomb Extreme
fragrances.description: Spicebomb Extreme starts off with a kick as cumin, cinnamon and saffron provide heat and presence. Subtle grapefruit opens up the scent. A hint of lavender weaves through the middle notes, connecting the spices to a rich and sweet base of vanilla, bourbon and tobacco.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Code
fragrances.description: Armani Code Cologne is a sophisticated fragrance that features a harmonious blend of notes. In the opening, the head notes introduce a fresh and vibrant combination of lemon and bergamot. Moving to the middle notes, the fragrance reveals a captivating accord of refined and elegant iris, enhanced by the warm and seductive tones of tonka bean absolute. Complementing the composition, clary sage adds a touch of herbal freshness, while musk provides a sensual and inviting base. The result is a classy and well-blended fragrance that exudes confidence and charm. Armani Code Cologne captures the essence of masculinity with its sophisticated iris note, making it a timeless and alluring choice for any occasion.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: La Vie Est Belle
fragrances.description: Happiness reigns when you wear this light, floral scent that features top notes of bergamot, raspberry and pink pepper that blend into the heart notes of ylang-ylang and rose before descending into the warmth of patchouli and iris.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Le Beau Paradise Garden
fragrances.description: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Beau Paradise Garden Cologne by Jean Paul Gaultier

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Voyage
fragrances.description: Nautica Voyage contains top notes of fresh green apples and budding leaves. Citrus fruits and lotus are the middle notes, which give the cologne even more freshness and brightness. Rounding out the bottom notes are scents of amber and cedar, making Nautica Voyage a well-balanced fragrance that anyone can wear whenever they want to feel uplifted and invigorated.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: The One EDP
fragrances.description: The top notes of Grapefruit, Coriander, and Basil provide a fresh and invigorating opening. The heart consists of sparkling notes of Ginger, Cardamom, and Orange Blossom add a spicy and vibrant touch. The base notes of Amber, Tobacco, and Cedar create a warm and rich foundation. Together, these notes blend to create an alluring and masculine fragrance with a touch of freshness and warmth.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Irish Tweed
fragrances.description: Green Irish Tweed Cologne by Creed, This sporty mix is sure to make any man feel like a famous movie star. With hints of violet leaves, Mysore sandalwood, Florentine iris, ambergris, and French verbena, Green Irish Tweed is known for its longevity and reasonable sillage. Though certainly not overpowering, its refreshing and luxurious aroma lingers on the mind long after its wearer has departed the room. Furthermore, it's widely considered to be one of the defining scents of the brand’s catalogue. Green Irish Tweed was first released in 1985 and originally made for Hollywood icon Cary Grant. Creed has a long and storied history in the fragrance world with over 250 years in business. Founded by James Henry Creed after designing a fragrance for King George Iii, the company’s products present a modernized scent of past triumphs. Many iconic figures throughout history have enjoyed the company's products, including Queen Maria Cristina of Spain, Emperor Franz-Josef of Austria-Hungary, and Empress Eugenie of France.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Acqua Di Gio Profumo
fragrances.description: Dive into the depth and intensity of the Mediterranean Sea with Acqua Di Gio Profumo by Giorgio Armani. This captivating men's fragrance embodies sophistication and intense masculinity, making it an unforgettable choice for the modern man. Just as the sea meets the rock, this scent marries freshness with robustness, creating a harmonious blend that lingers on the skin.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Terre D' Hermes
fragrances.description: Terre D'Hermes cologne is a warm fragrance for men with vibrant bursts of fruits and elevating fresh spices. Orange and grapefruit provide a citrusy opening, and the heart warms up with pepper, pelargonium and flint. The fragrance settles into its earthiness with coarse vetiver and other warm accords including cedar, patchouli and benzoin.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Replica Jazz Club
fragrances.description: Replica Jazz Club Cologne by Maison Margiela, Saunter in wearing your fanciest suit and join your friends on the dance floor for a night of endless fun while wearing Replica Jazz Club. This heady men's fragrance combines spicy, balsamic, powdery and aromatic accords for a well-crafted olfactory treat that deserves to be enjoyed with a designer cocktail in hand. Top notes of zesty lemon, fresh neroli and bright pink pepper instantly set the scene with their vibrancy and exuberance. Adding to this are heart notes of Java vetiver oil, clary sage and rum, which lend a smoky, herbal ambience to the formula that imitates the dark rooms of the club itself. Finally, base notes of styrax, vanilla bean and tobacco leaf leave a creamy rich foundation that's sure to settle into your skin for hours after last call.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Baccarat Rouge 540
fragrances.description: Baccarat Rouge 540 extrait de parfum intensifies the radiance of the three auras found in the eau de parfum without betraying the original inspiration. The perfumer’s mastered craft and the wisdom gained with time gave birth to this woody extrait de perfume, an ultimate accomplishment for Francis Kurkdjian. The Grandiflorum jasmine head note gently underscores the craftsman’s voice. The hint of fire is enhanced with powdered epicurean facets of bitter almond. Lastly, the mineral note built around ambergris is tamed with an ambery and woody accord. Adding to the intensity of the extrait, the perfume bottle also plays with light. Its aesthetic dons a brilliant red robe reminiscent of Baccarat red. Baccarat Rouge 540 Maison Francis Kurkdjian extrait de parfum embodies the profusion and fusion of elements that can only be tamed by the art of the perfumer and the wisdom gained with time.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer

fragrances.name: Tuxedo
fragrances.description: TUXEDO captivates just like the iconic suit whose name it borrows. The lushness of Patchouli attracts and embraces, while the sensual mystery of Spices mesmerizes and arouses. A contemporary elegance perpetually reinvented with that particular impertinent touch that makes it so unique.

comments.comment: Amazing longevity and projection. Perfect for daily wear!
Great scent but could last longer
